note.p: Nurseryman and seedsman. Ran a nursery in Westerham, Kent, until at least 1881. Son of John Cattell (1819/20–69). Married Mary Ann Fox (1853–94) in 1874. Lived in Doncaster, Yorkshire, with his deceased wife’s sisters in 1911.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/489/75/13), 1881 (RG11/909/64/12), 1911 (RG14/28193)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 24 September 2015
West Yorkshire, England, deaths and burials, 1813–1985 (Ancestry.com, accessed 24 September 2015)
